short_summary: Hotel Accommodations for 30 rooms for 84 nights from June 12 to September 4, 2023
description:
Bid solicitation for hotel accommodations for 30 staff members from June 12 to September 4, 2023, to cover the staffing needs required for summer surge capacity. 

The hotel or hotels must be within a twenty (20) km of Ports of Entry (POE) within Niagara Falls District, Ontario, Canada.

The period of the Contract is from Contract award to December 31, 2023.

The work is to be performed during the period of June 12, 2023 to September 4, 2023.

Option to Extend the Contract: The Contractor grants to Canada the irrevocable option to extend the term of the Contract up to one (1) additional one (1) year period under the same conditions.

Enquiries: All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature are to be submitted to the Contracting Authority.

Note: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
**Reference:** PW-23-01021590
**Date Published:** January 16, 2023
**Closing Date:** February 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

**Tender Description:**
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking proposals for hotel accommodations to provide temporary housing for 30 staff members from June 12 to September 4, 2023. The contract will be for a period of 84 nights, from June 12 to September 4, 2023.

**Scope of Work:**
The selected Contractor shall provide hotel accommodations within 20 km of the Ports of Entry (POE) in the Niagara Falls District, Ontario, Canada. The Contractor should ensure the hotel or hotels meet the CBSA's requirements for the duration of the contract.

**Communication:**
All correspondence and inquiries should be addressed to CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca. Bidders must submit their proposals through the Government of Canada's Electronic Tendering System.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The tender will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical proposal
* Price
* Commercial and contractual requirements

**Other Requirements:**
The successful Contractor shall provide a contract administration software to facilitate communication and management of the contract.

**Tender Documents:**
The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and addenda, are available on the Government of Canada's Electronic Tendering System. Bidders must review and comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the tender documents.

**Language of Documentation:**
The tender documents are available in both English and French.

**Bidder's Obligations:**
Bidders are responsible for ensuring their proposal and supporting documents meet the requirements outlined in the tender documents. Late submissions will not be accepted. The CBSA reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers and may extend the contract period.

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries or questions, please contact:

    Yuqiao Hu
    Contracting Authority
    Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
    355 North River Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0L8, Canada
    Phone: 343-551-8763
    Email: yuqiao.hu@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
